scripts.db:seed: sh -c 'if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ] && [ -f dist-cli/cli/seed.js ]; then node dist-cli/cli/seed.js; else npx tsx src/lib/db/seed.ts; fi'
scripts.db:seed-profile: sh -c 'if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ] && [ -f dist-cli/cli/seed-profile.js ]; then node dist-cli/cli/seed-profile.js; else npx tsx src/lib/db/seed-profile.ts; fi'
scripts.db:seed-templates: sh -c 'if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ] && [ -f dist-cli/cli/seed-templates.js ]; then node dist-cli/cli/seed-templates.js; else npx tsx src/lib/db/seed-templates.ts; fi'
scripts.db:migrate: sh -c 'if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ] && [ -f dist-cli/cli/migrate.js ]; then node dist-cli/cli/migrate.js; else npx tsx src/lib/db/migrate.ts; fi'
